item.description:
Now that the holidays are behind us... I hope everyone will join us to talk
about webby techy stuff...

It is a pretty cozy set-up at Hotel Northampton, with a friendly hostess (Dina), and
no pressure to spend a certain amount of money. People are free to only order a
beverage, or a small dish or dinner- it doesn't really matter.

And:
Like our previous meetings: To help us get to know each other and facilitate discussion (with your permission, I will circulate a list of meeting attendees; with each person's

-brief bio
-areas of interest, training, or specialty
-links to past or current work (if viewable online

email me your info or update your profile if you haven't already.
Thanks! and see you soon...
and looking forward to meeting all you new members!- So don't be shy!

I am open to suggestions so if a different day is better for a number of people- or you would like to suggest another location let me know.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: January Meet-up
